title: Velo Cosmos Grass Valley Returns November 14th at the Holbrooke Hotel!
content:
Velo Cosmos, a celebration of vintage cycling, returns to the Holbrooke Hotel in Grass Valley, California this year on November 14th. This event’s long-term goal is to create gatherings where all kinds of cyclists – or future cyclists can meet in one place, get excited and learn about the culture and history of bicycles. You can see our recap from last year’s event in our Archives.

The weekend includes:

  • Bicycle Exhibition & Concours d’Elegance 
  • Road, MTB, Gravel, Handbuilt, Vintage, Race, Custom
  • Bicycle Art: Bike- Jewelry, Photography, Prints, Fashion, Books etc
  • Swap Meet
  • Group Rides on Friday at Harmony Ridge and on Saturday in Grass Valley      ​   ​
  • Industry Legends and Famous Guests
  • Presentations from Joe Breeze, Paul Skilbeck, etc
  • Kids Drawing Concours and Jewelry Making
  • World Class Food, Bar & After-Party
  • BBQ at the Outside Patio​​
  • Custom prints from Chris McNally for Concours Winners
  • Vendors
  • Raffle with Great Prizes to Win

Check out the full schedule and more at Velo Cosmos!

The post Velo Cosmos Grass Valley Returns November 14th at the Holbrooke Hotel! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
